en.title: **Backend Engineer**
en.text:
• Led the development of web applications using Django, focusing on customizing models, views, templates, and forms to create dynamic, feature-rich websites.

• Integrated third-party libraries and APIs to extend functionality, while leveraging Django's authentication and authorization system.

• Collaborated effectively within the development team, showcasing strong problem-solving skills and contributing to a culture of teamwork and innovation.

en.title: **Backend Developer**
en.text:
• Developed the membership feature of the MyNextFilm (MNF) platform, catering to students, institutions, and corporations in the film industry.

• Implemented user registration flows for different user types, including affiliated and unaffiliated students, waiting students, institutions, and corporations.

• Designed and integrated intuitive dashboards for each user type, enabling credit requests, usage tracking, and account management.

en.title: **Software Engineer**
en.text:
WTX-Web:

• Focused on feature development and maintenance, improving the React frontend for enhanced performance and usability.

• Integrated Material UI (MUI) and d3.js to enhance UI/UX, enabling better interactivity and visualization.

WTX-Layout-Assistant:

• Led full-stack development, designing and building the entire project, including a DXF to SVG conversion pipeline and annotation editors.

• Implemented Flask-based form validation and optimized heater layout generation from CAD files.

Automation & Deployment:

• Created scripts for API documentation validation and automated heater configuration.

• Managed Docker deployments, dependency handling with Poetry, and collaborated in an Agile environment to ensure smooth development cycles.
